titles.title: Helping Homeless Veterans Act of 2023
Helping Homeless Veterans Act of 2023
To amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent certain programs that assist homeless veterans and other veterans with special needs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary:
Helping Homeless Veterans Act of 2023
This bill permanently extends the following Department of Veterans Affairs programs and services:
treatment and rehabilitation for seriously mentally ill veterans and homeless veterans, housing assistance for homeless veterans, financial assistance for the Supportive Services for Veteran Families program, a grant program for homeless veterans with special needs, and the Advisory Committee on Homeless Veterans.
